name: Six of Wands
fortune_telling: Someone is planning a party for you, but not everyone feels so good about your recent success

light: Being recognized as a capable person
Being cheered on by the crowd
shadow: Allowing your achievements to inflate your ego
Looking down on people who seem less capable
Craving to be the center of attention

questions_to_ask: What kind of recognition do I crave? Why?
How freely do I praise the achievements of others?
What happens when the parade is over?
